hanzi-su-wiki:
膨

Значения

Вздуваться, распухать; раздувать, надувать

Мнемоника

Распухая, органы 月 начинают пульсировать как барабанный 豆 бой 彡.
purpleculture_pinyin:
péng
swollen
вздутый
rtega_mnemonic:
膨膨RSswell, expand, inflate, thick
  • flesh 月 becoming bigger after slapping on it 彭: swell
purpleculture_info: Pictophonetic: 彭 indicates the sound; ⺼ (flesh) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
膨胀 [ péng zhàng ]: to expand; to inflate; to swell
通货膨胀 [ tōng huò péng zhàng ]: inflation
膨润土 [ péng rùn tǔ ]: bentonite (mineralogy)
使膨胀 [ shǐ péng zhàng ]: to dilate; to expand
恶性通货膨胀 [ è xìng tōng huò péng zhàng ]: hyperinflation
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • ⺼ meat, flesh; organic compound
    • 彭 [ péng ] name of an ancient country; surname
heisig_chinese_memo: An injured body part may become puffy. It will begin to throb like a bass drum and will change shape.
heisig_constituent: swell, moon, month, flesh, part of the body, drum, samurai, beans, table, one, mouth, shape
koohiiStory1: This kanji does not mean swell as in a inflammation. There is a different kanji for that meaning (腫れる). This kanji means swell as in, a tire swelling/expanding, your income swelling/expanding, dough swelling/expanding, etc. Johnskb's story is best b/c it does not involve swelling in the sense of inflammation, just general expansion of the stomach. STORY: "If a PART OF your BODY begins to SWELL/EXPAND and resembles the SHAPE of a bass DRUM, you’re either pregnant or in desperate need of a diet.".
koohiiStory2: Which part of your body can change shape and, when it does, swells up and throbs like a drumb? Hmmm...
jp_example_words:
膨れる(ふくれる): to get cross, to get sulky, to swell (out), to expand, to be inflated, to distend, to bulge
膨脹(ぼうちょう): expansion, swelling, increase, growth
膨らます(ふくらます): swell, expand, inflate, bulge
膨らむ(ふくらむ): expand, get big, become inflated
膨大(ぼうだい): huge, bulky, enormous, extensive, swelling, expansion
jp_readingExamples: 膨らむ (ふく.らむ), 膨れる (ふく.れる)
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: Play your drum under the moon and your hair will swell! The more you play and the longer it's under the moon, the larger your hair will swell.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Have you been suffering from flat, boring hair? Well do I have the swelling treatment you've been looking for!
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: Using this method, your hair swells so much it looks like a giant bowling (ぼう) ball is sitting on top of your head. It's all round, and well... swollen is probably the only word that fits.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Imagine watching your hair swell to the size of a large bowling ball. Imagine never being able to go bowling again because the comparison is too easy for people to make.
Ru_Radicals: 并, 十 (десять), 口 (рот), 土 (земля), 彡 (украшение), 月 (месяц), 豆 (боб)
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the furry (彡) body part (⺼) with the ten beans (壴) swells
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: An injured body part may become puffy. It will begin to throb like a bass drum and will change shape.

膨字的基本解释

膨
péng
〔膨脝〕肚子胀的样子。
胀：膨胀。膨大。膨化。

膨字的汉语字典释义

[①]［péng］
［《廣韻》蒲孟切，去映，並。］
胀大。
[②]［péng］
［《廣韻》薄庚切，平庚，並。］
见“膨2脝”。

膨字的康熙字典解释

【未集下】【肉字部】　膨； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页994第04
【廣韻】【集韻】?蒲孟切，音?。脹也。　又【廣韻】薄庚切【集韻】蒲庚切，?音彭。【廣韻】膨脝，脹貌。【集韻】膨脝，大腹。【韓愈·石鼎聮句】豕腹脹膨脝。　又【集韻】普孟切，亨去聲。義同。

膨字的源字形

膨字的起名意思

体积或长度增大 。

膨
形声字。月(肉)表意,其形像一块肉,表示和肉体有关;彭(peng)表声,彭为鼓声,有壮盛意,肌肉胀大也有壮盛的意
味。本义是肚子胀大的样子。泛指物体隆出胀大。
胀大:~大|~胀。
~大 ~化 ~胀

イo成cin。
主
Выпуклость
Пиктофонетические символы.
Луна (плоть) означает, что ее изображение похоже на кусок мяса, что означает, что она связана с плотью; Пэн (пэн) выражает звук, а Пэн - звук барабанов, который имеет сильное значение и признак мускулов. припухлость.
Первоначальное значение - появление вздутого живота.
Относится к выпуклости и набуханию предметов.

péng
гл. вспухать; раздуваться, вздуваться; разбухать
Radicals: 月, 壴, 彡  (moon, drum, hair)
Meaning Mnemonic
Play your drum under the moon and your hair will swell! The more you play and the longer it's under the moon, the larger your hair will swell.
Have you been suffering from flat, boring hair? Well do I have the swelling treatment you've been looking for!
Reading Mnemonic
Using this method, your hair swells so much it looks like a giant bowling (ぼう) ball is sitting on top of your head. It's all round, and well... swollen is probably the only word that fits.
Imagine watching your hair swell to the size of a large bowling ball. Imagine never being able to go bowling again because the comparison is too easy for people to make.
